General.Name: Ningxia Younglight Chemicals Co Ltd
General.Description: Ningxia Yinglite Chemicals Co., Ltd produces hazardous chemicals in China. The company offers calcium carbide, lime nitrogen, dicyandiamide, caustic soda, polyvinyl chloride resin, liquid chlorine, hydrochloric acid, and other related products. It is also involved in power generation, transmission, and distribution; supply of heat production, equipment repair; metal cutting and welding manufacturing; and repairing of special equipment and metal products. In addition, the company offers electrical and mechanical equipment maintenance, repair, and electrical installation services; and manufactures non-metallic mineral products. Further, it provides labor dispatch, accommodation, catering, cleaning, and disinfection services, as well as lime and gypsum related products. Additionally, the company engages in retailing of tobacco products and food sales businesses, as well as involved in non-residential real estate, housing, machinery and equipment, land use right, and special equipment leasing services. Ningxia Yinglite Chemicals Co., Ltd was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Shizuishan, China. Ningxia Yinglite Chemicals Co., Ltd is a subsidiary of Guodian Yinglite Energy and Chemical Group Co., Ltd.

2.Name: Mr. Xue Jun  Li
